QuestData.Title: Tyrande's Command
QuestData.Description: Shal'aran is bursting at the seams with refugees and rebels. We practically have an army now but not enough weapons or mana to keep everyone armed and un-withered.$b$bAnd in all of this, Tyrande has a battery of requests I simply do not have the time to deal with.$b$bWill you go to her? Her growing army is hard to miss in Meredil.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tyrande Whisperwind in Meredil.
QuestData.RewardText: The Nightfallen insisted on being a part in this conflict. There is more work to be done than people we have.
